thread.title: BRIEF-Granite Point Mortgage Trust Reports Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.33

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Granite Point Mortgage Trust Reports Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.33

organizations.name: reuters) - granite point mortgage trust inc

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Granite Point Mortgage Trust Inc:
* REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND POST-QUARTER END BUSINESS UPDATE
* Q4 CORE EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.34 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.33 * QTRLY GAAP NET INCOME OF $14.1 MILLION OR $0.33 PER COMMON SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
